content: Hey there! How can I help you today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
just trying to remember our time in the park

I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you? I appreciate you checking in on me.  You mentioned our time in the park, and I'm afraid my memory of that is a bit fuzzy.  Could you tell me more about what you're thinking of?  For example, when was this, and what park are we talking about?
